translations: （犹太）拉比（对有学识的人的尊称）；法学博士（rabbi 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Conservative rabbis recognized all conversions done according to halakha.
sentences.translation: 根据犹太教法，保守的拉比承认所有转换完成。

sentences.sentence: Rabbis are not uncommon in larger cities of the south.
sentences.translation: 犹太教祭司在南方大城市并不罕见。

sentences.sentence: Women are now able to become Rabbis because of what Regina accomplished.
sentences.translation: 妇女现在能成为拉比是因为雷吉娜曾经做过。
